title: How to log request.headers() in besu RPC call: JsonRpcRequest jsonRpcRequest = request.getRequest();
body:
Hello There Besu developers, 

I am new to Besu and learning besu by myself.

I forked Besu, build dependencies, ran Besu node. Upto here everyting is fine. 

But now I started making small changes inside the RPC methods for example adding logs etc. 

So Inside the rpc method name eth_getBalance, and the file name is EthGetBalance.java. 

I made some changes for logging the request payload. for logging the request payload I used this code. 

`JsonRpcRequest jsonRpcRequest = request.getRequest();

    LOG.error("jsonRpcRequest payload:::::::::::::: {}", jsonRpcRequest);`
    
  it works fine and I am able to see the logs for my request payload at console.
  
  
![image](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/assets/89021712/15fae3e3-6f73-4c9e-91af-222afafe34f9)


Now I want to log the request header. but I am not sure how can I do so. and looking for some help from some help. 

Thanks.
